description._content: Cooley, Sam A., photographer. Mortar Battery, Morris Island, S.C. [New York] : E. & H.T. Anthony & Co., [1865] 1 photographic print on stereo card : stereograph, albumen ; 3.5 x 7 in. Notes: Photograph shows Union officers and solders on Morris Island in Charleston harbor, standing by mortars aimed at Fort Sumter. No. 3513 from "War Views." Title from item. Hand written on back of card: Miller, vol. 2, p. 319. Part of series: The War for the Union. Photographic History. Forms part of: Civil War Photograph Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Mortars (Ordnance)--South Carolina--Charleston--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Union--South Carolina--Charleston. Format: Stereographs--1860-1870. Albumen prints--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/stereo.1s02573 hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/stereo.2s02573 Call Number: LOT 4166-B, no. 204
